last_50_posts.content:
It is so disappointing that our government would fall for this kind of absurdity. They are now going to add a third possible gender option for people applying for a passport who don’t want to identify as a man or a woman. This administration seems to have declared war on common sense, and they want you, me, and everyone else to believe and go along with a lie. It is very sad and concerning. And it is another reminder of the desperate need for Christians to PRAY for our nation and all those in positions of leadership—whether we agree with them or not. We need God’s mercy and help.

https://www.nbcnews.com/nbc-out/out-politics-and-policy/us-add-third-gender-option-american-passports-rcna1314

The Samaritan's Purse Disaster Assistance Response Team stands ready to respond within 24 hours to meet critical needs around the world for victims of war, poverty, famine, disease, and natural disasters. To learn more or apply to join the DART and serve in Jesus’ Name, visit this link: https://www.samaritanspurse.org/our-ministry/dart-learn-more/
“All the sins that you and I have were laid on [Jesus Christ]. He voluntarily did it because He loves you…” -Billy Graham #WednesdayWisdom

My father Billy Graham began an evangelistic Crusade in Birmingham, England, on this day in 1984. Watch this short clip from one of his messages where he asked, “Are you willing to say no to the temptations of the tempter—and yes to the claims of Christ?” #WednesdayWisdom

As followers of the Lord Jesus Christ—

We are people of the Blood.
“…the blood of Jesus his Son cleanses us from all sin.” (1 John 1:7)

We are people of the Book.
"Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceeds from the mouth of God." (Matthew 4:4)

We are people of the Blessed Hope.
“Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;” (Titus 2:13)

Rejoice in this truth today and share it with others!

My friend @ToddStarnes will be signing copies of his new book "Our Daily Biscuit" next month at @TheBGLibrary. You can get your copy at the event or you can order it online here: https://www.amazon.com/Our-Daily-Biscuit-Devotions-Drawl/dp/1642938920/ref=sr_1_2?dchild=1&keywords=todd+starnes&qid=1624365910&sr=8-2

This should outrage all of us—because it’s where we’re headed as a nation. God made us male and female, end of discussion. Here’s a story about a man exposing himself to women and young girls at a spa in California. The individual, the media, and the spa staff might see this as a transgender person with the right to be there, but the outraged woman reporting it to workers at the spa says in her video that she knows what she saw—and it was definitely a biological man! This is twisted and it’s absolutely wrong. When we open the door legally for this kind of confusion, we all know where it’s going. What about everyone else’s rights to privacy and safety? No matter which state you’re in, the only people allowed in women’s restrooms and dressings rooms should be biological women, not some jerk who says he feels like identifying as a woman today. Furthermore, most states have laws against men exposing themselves to children—shouldn’t this man be charged with criminal indecent exposure?
https://www.westernjournal.com/video-fed-woman-takes-action-protect-girls-transgender-woman-allegedly-exposes-spa-nothing/

Yesterday Ethiopia declared an immediate cease-fire in the Tigray region of the country. The conflict has been raging for nearly eight months with thousands killed and hundreds of thousands of people facing a famine crisis. Samaritan's Purse has staff on the ground and we have been helping as many war-affected families as possible, many of whom have had to flee their homes. Our team is now on lockdown. Please pray with us for their safety and for peace to be restored in this volatile region. https://apnews.com/article/ethiopia-tigray-cease-fire-2745f0941cafcfa8fbe4c9f945f0925d?fbclid=IwAR1cnww0M1mSIY97YSrJki614nHYYVSxcLF3hBOWDrgOMj6jLITsDTgx1ug

"Let us live in a manner worthy of such a high honor: Be strong & of good courage, go all out for God—faithful, immovable, bold & strong in the power of His might. What time is it? It’s your time to stand." Read more from Jonathan Cahn in Decision News: https://decisionmagazine.com/jonathan-cahn-in-perilous-times-be-faithful-and-bold/

If you’re competing in the Olympics to represent the U.S. and you disrespect our country by disrespecting the flag or our national anthem, that should automatically disqualify you from the team. No ifs, ands, or buts. Gwen Berry is a self-defined athlete activist who turned her back on the American flag when the national anthem began playing after her qualifying trials this Saturday. This is not the way, the time, or the place, for activists to protest. Most athletes are deeply honored to represent the United States of America, still the greatest nation on earth to live in.
https://www.foxnews.com/sports/message-sent-berry-turns-away-from-flag-during-anthem

Sunday evening, the U.S. military conducted defensive airstrikes against three operational and weapons storage facilities near the Iraq/Syria border. The Pentagon said this was in response to continued drone attacks by the militia against U.S. personnel and facilities in Iraq. Pray especially for our military who are serving on the front lines in this region of the world. And it is so important that we pray for our leaders—for President Biden and all those in authority. The Bible tells us to pray “for kings and all those in authority, that we may live peaceful and quiet lives in all godliness and holiness” (1 Timothy 2:2). They need help and wisdom from God. https://www.foxnews.com/us/u-s-military-launches-airstrikes-against-three-facilities-on-iraq-syria-border

“And David said: ‘Blessed are you, O Lord, the God of Israel our father, forever and ever. Yours, O Lord, is the greatness and the power and the glory and the victory and the majesty, for all that is in the heavens and in the earth is yours. Yours is the kingdom, O Lord, and you are exalted as head above all. Both riches and honor come from you, and you rule over all. In your hand are power and might, and in your hand it is to make great and to give strength to all. And now we thank you, our God, and praise your glorious name.’” (1 Chronicles 29:10-13)

Rescuers at the condominium collapse near Miami are working 24/7 to find survivors and victims— 4 people are confirmed dead and 159 are still unaccounted for. They are using dogs, cameras, sonar, hammers, picks, heavy equipment—anything they can, as the clock ticks. Rescuers are risking their own lives working below ground and some are being hit by falling debris. Let’s lift these workers up in prayer, asking God to help and protect them. Also pray for every missing person and their family members awaiting word. This catastrophe has devastated so many.
https://www.reuters.com/world/us/biden-approves-florida-emergency-declaration-after-building-collapse-2021-06-25/

My friend Todd Starnes has a great new devotional book out called "Our Daily Biscuit." Check it out here: https://www.amazon.com/Our-Daily-Biscuit-Devotions-Drawl/dp/1642938920/ref=sr_1_2?dchild=1&keywords=todd+starnes&qid=1624365910&sr=8-2

At least 4 people have died & 159 are unaccounted for after a condominium building in Surfside, FL, partially collapsed yesterday. Our BGEA Rapid Response Team chaplains are responding to offer comfort & spiritual care to this grieving community. https://billygraham.org/story/chaplains-deploy-to-deadly-miami-condo-collapse/

While millions of Americans are refusing to work, 20-year-old Donte Franklin has been WALKING 17 miles round trip in the searing Oklahoma heat to work at a restaurant. Donte said, “I really don't care if it gets tiring, I just have to keep pushing…I walk just to make my family proud.” What a great example Donte is setting! A kind-hearted Good Samaritan named Michael Lynn spotted Donte one day and offered him a ride. When he learned Donte’s story and how he was getting to work, Michael posted about it on Facebook and a charity group who read the post provided a bicycle for Donte! And now others are raising money to buy him a car. That will be such a game-changer for this young man. Michael told the media, “I think we need to help each other.” So true. The Bible tells us, "Let each of you look not only to his own interests, but also to the interests of others" (Philippians 2:4). https://people.com/human-interest/20-year-old-walked-17-miles-to-and-from-work-surprised-with-new-bike/?fbclid=IwAR26KI2YM4c7Oev9ZZnctcT7uiSOS-rMGGOeHNizDyig1EmeBWb9ZlxKHM4

In the darkness of the early morning hours today, the unexpected happened in Surfside, Florida. A 12-story condominium building partially collapsed, leaving area residents and visitors shocked and stunned. Officials say that at least one person is dead and they fear many others may be found as emergency crews search through the debris in the coming hours. Pray for the family members of those who lived in the building waiting to hear if their loved ones are safe or not. The Bible tells us, “God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble” (Psalm 46:1).

https://www.nbcmiami.com/news/local/1-dead-massive-search-and-rescue-effort-after-partial-collapse-of-condo-building-in-surfside/2479570/

I’ve been to Silverton, Colorado, several times and I never thought this western historic mining town would ban the Pledge of Allegiance! At a board of trustees meeting on Flag Day, Silverton Mayor Shane Fuhrman had the gall to ban the Pledge of Allegiance from public meetings. He said it was because of the “direct threats” and “divisiveness” that it brings to the community. Those in attendance didn’t go along with his idea at all, and when it was time for public comments, they stood and recited the Pledge of Allegiance together. When they were finished, Mayor Fuhrman said they were out of order and that they would be asked to leave if they did it again. I think this mayor is the one who is out of order! It’s a shame that an elected official would feel this way about the Pledge of Allegiance. It’s important that we take time to recognize and honor our country’s flag—a flag that represents the freedom that so many fought and died for. I’m proud of these citizens and trustees for standing up for that. Silverton may need to re-think who they select for mayor. What do you think about this?

https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-9713455/Colorado-mayor-sparks-outcry-BANNING-Pledge-Allegiance-public-meetings.html?fbclid=IwAR3v9PHQUQKd37N8F1dp_ScrJMNl84M0qaKr7SiCGgjfy24EK8fptBztCpM

If you've visited The Billy Graham Library in Charlotte, NC, you might have tried my grandmother, Mother Graham’s, delicious chicken salad sandwich from the Graham Brothers Dairy Bar. If you haven’t, the Billy Graham Evangelistic Association recently shared the family recipe: https://billygraham.org/story/billy-graham-librarys-chicken-salad/#

#OnThisDay in 1967 my father Billy Graham began a Crusade in London, England. Watch this short clip from one of his messages where he asked those in attendance, “What will [God] see when He sees your heart?” #WednesdayWisdom

You know just how much kids love electronics & games—at least my grandchildren do! Samaritan’s Purse has a Bible game app for children between the ages of 5-9 called Greatest Journey. For more & to download it for FREE visit: http://sampur.se/TGJapp

In 2016 I went to all 50 states holding prayer rallies for our nation and I urged Christians to run for office in their cities and communities—specifically for school boards—and this is exactly the reason why! School boards are making decisions about what is being taught in our schools and the policies that will be followed. These impact our children and our grandchildren’s lives, and they impact the future of our country, so it is vitally important. I'm thankful for the parents in Loudoun County, Virginia, who are speaking up and working to keep things like critical race theory and concerning transgender policies out of their schools. We have to stand up against the godless socialist agenda trying to divide us and take over this country.

Pray for the Christians in Loudoun County, that they would stand strong and speak the truth in love. And pray about how you can get involved in your city and make a real difference. Will you?

https://www.foxnews.com/us/virginia-loudoun-county-school-board-mulls-transgender-critical-race-theory-policies?fbclid=IwAR2rhBqMyyEQ8rDQOLzZINrgqbN6wLaJAw4iNHzOQViw7fEvpRGchQEMm1g

This week Meghan McCain, daughter of the late Senator John McCain, said that she believed President Biden was “doing grave spiritual harm to himself and the country” with his support of abortion. I have disagreed with Meghan on a number of political issues, but I think she is absolutely right on this issue. She said, “As far as I'm concerned, abortion is murder…and that is a doctrine that’s as old as the Catholic Church itself…It's like saying, ‘I’m personally opposed to murder but if you want to murder a little bit it's fine because it's not my problem’…And he's going to have to ultimately talk to his creator when the time comes, as we all do, and reconcile his politics with his personal faith."

I appreciate that Meghan isn’t afraid to state the truth—and that she is willing to defend life even if it isn’t politically correct to some. I pray that President Biden will reconsider his position on abortion in this country. Let Meghan know that you appreciate her boldness in the comments below…

https://thehill.com/homenews/media/559421-meghan-mccain-biden-doing-grave-spiritual-harm-to-himself-and-country-with?fbclid=IwAR38BRbErEoqdjJObY_x73EyFieHZ4Q4qkTcUXB_6KlWfkfZW0RHPaceOOI

Shame on the Olympics for not respecting and protecting women’s sports. It took decades upon decades for women to expand opportunities in athletics. So much for that with the International Olympic Committee policy opening the door for biological males to take those opportunities right back. 21-yr-old weightlifter Kuinini Manumua lost her chance to represent New Zealand in weightlifting because a biological male identifying as a woman qualified ahead of her. The transgender weightlifter has competed in men’s events in the past. This is unfair and just wrong. A female competitor from Belgium said, “Life-changing opportunities are missed for some athletes—medals and Olympic qualifications—and we are powerless.” This is sad and a major step back for women’s athletics.

https://www.foxnews.com/sports/laurel-hubbard-is-the-first-transgender-athlete-to-compete-in-olympics

Please pray for all those who lost loved ones in this tragic 15-car pile-up on I-65 in Alabama yesterday in torrential rain.

https://www.foxnews.com/us/alabama-interstate-wreck-10-dead-including-9-children
“And He changes the times and the seasons…” (Daniel 2:21) #Alaska #SummerSolstice
I told Pamela Brown on CNN last night that we need God’s help to solve the problems we face. We have taken God out of everything and our nation has become morally bankrupt.

Happy Father’s Day to all the dads out there. This is the 3rd Father’s Day since my father Billy Graham’s homegoing to Heaven. I don’t think we ever stop missing them, do we? Someone recently asked me what my favorite memories of my father were and what we liked doing together. I remember as a boy when he would return home from traveling, he would make it a point to spend time with each of us children. He would take me hunting or fishing—or just going out in the yard with me to throw the baseball meant so much. He didn’t just throw it a couple of times, either—I remember us throwing the ball back and forth until my arm was tired! The simple things make such a huge impact. I thank God for my father’s life, his love for the Lord, and the great example he set.

The Bible says, "As a father has compassion on his children, so the Lord has compassion on those who fear him" (Psalm 103:13).

Today we commemorate the end of slavery in this country— Juneteenth is the first new national holiday in nearly 40 years! June 19, 1865, is when Union soldiers brought the news of freedom to slaves in Galveston, Texas — two months after the Confederacy had surrendered. Union General Gordon Granger read the long-awaited good news aloud, "all slaves are free" from the Galveston County courthouse. History should motivate the world to not repeat the tragic mistakes of the past and should also motivate us to continually strive to make the future better for the next generation. This can only happen with the help of Almighty God.
#OneNationUnderGod

https://www1.cbn.com/cbnnews/us/2021/june/u-s-senate-passes-bill-to-make-juneteenth-a-federal-holiday-marking-the-end-of-slavery?fbclid=IwAR2dF2w7fPhKRo8Wy9p2aiyA6hGvUrrw1UPBou4jZx-C2qVHELXEQ28JnP8
What is truth? Jesus Christ said, “I am the way, the #TRUTH, and the life…” (John 14:6). #ThursdayThoughts

In a major win for religious freedom today, the U.S. Supreme Court ruled with a Catholic adoption agency that would not work with LGBT couples. The vote was unanimous. I am thankful that our Supreme Court justices saw the importance of this issue under the law. Religious agencies and organizations should not be forced to go against their beliefs and biblical standards. In this case, the city of Philadelphia was refusing to use a Catholic adoption agency because their religious beliefs prevent them from working with same-sex foster parents. Let’s give thanks to God that the Supreme Court ruled correctly.

https://www.cnbc.com/2021/06/17/supreme-court-sides-with-catholic-adoption-agency-that-refuses-to-work-with-lgbt-couples.html

They couldn’t be attacking a nicer guy. Our friend Jack Phillips, the Colorado baker, is back in the news because a judge ruled against him on Tuesday in the case in which he is sued for refusing to design and create a cake to celebrate the gender transition of a man to a woman. That is against Jack’s sincerely held religious beliefs, and he is standing up for his rights to decline to be a part of something he doesn’t believe in. In taking this stand, he is fighting for all of our rights to do the same. This seems to be a saga that won’t end for Jack and his family. Join me in praying for Jack today, and encouraging him in the comments below!

https://www.denverpost.com/2021/06/16/colorado-baker-fined-transgender-transition-cake/?fbclid=IwAR2kL0LV5lmW0566jVtu1RJLXgg6E0R4u7fmetrcxpECmRl2FTz5viO_aSE
“Have you accepted the challenge of following Christ?” -Billy Graham #WednesdayWisdom

Pray for President Joe Biden and Russian President Vladimir Putin as they meet today. There is so much at stake.

https://www.cnn.com/world/live-news/biden-putin-meeting-geneva-updates-intl/index.html?fbclid=IwAR3n_Z8gLjnrwQWvuIKTojQy926D-7wbzCOvmEUcw4C9S2ieD3P5XC0FFkA

Four people were killed this morning in Chicago’s second mass shooting in four days. Mayor Lori Lightfoot is quoted in the news as saying, “We need help…” She means help from the federal government, but the bigger truth is—we need help from God. Gun control isn’t the answer—heart control is. It’s a matter of who is controlling the human heart. People need a heart change, and the only One who can transform the human heart is the Lord Jesus Christ when we surrender to Him in repentance and faith. The Bible says, “Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come” (2 Cor. 5:17). That’s the kind of help our cities and our neighborhoods really need—help that comes from turning to God. As churches and Christians, we have the responsibility of sharing the hope that comes through Jesus Christ, and we need to be sharing it with urgency because time is running out. We are to be the light that shines in the darkness of the world around us.

https://abcnews.go.com/US/injured-2nd-mass-shooting-chicago-days/story?id=78287039

America is under attack from within. Godless socialism and communism are threatening our very way of life in this country and the inroads already made are shocking. Even though no one has fired a shot, the battle is raging and we’d better wake up before it’s too late. It’s like some people have blinders on and don’t see the dangers of what is coming down the road.

Yeonmi Park sees the dangers though. She was born in North Korea and fled the oppression, risking everything to find freedom. The journey was long and hard, but now in the United States, Yeonmi was excited to go to an Ivy League university where she thought free-thought flourished and she could learn and grow. But that’s not what she found. Instead, the institution of higher learning was more concerned with political correctness and forcing her to think the way they wanted her to. She has been utterly shocked, saying it reminds her of the country she fled. They teach anti-Western sentiment, collective guilt, and suffocating political correctness. She was condemned for reading traditional American literature, saying that those authors were racists and bigots. Speaking three languages, she was dismayed when they said she must use incorrect pronouns like “they” and “them” rather than “him” and “her” to satisfy the gender police. Yeonmi said, "It was chaos. It felt like the regression in civilization." She rightly accused American higher education institutions of stripping people’s ability to think critically.

Yeonmi told the media that it seems like “people here are just dying to give their rights and power to the government. That is what scares me the most.” That’s what should scare us as well. It is said that, “The goal of socialism is communism.” Communism has always been the enemy of the church. They executed thousands upon thousands of pastors, priests, and other religiously affiliated people throughout Russia, Eastern Europe, and China. Pray that God will spare us and that our political leaders will wake up to the enemy that is at the gate.

https://www.foxnews.com/us/north-korean-defector-ivy-league-nuts?fbclid=IwAR3UN7dkkhEU40FsDYHHZlQ6T3lH-AjjsmP4osJETVYuYy9nI6xRArdTb_U

Fourteen years ago today, my mother, Ruth Bell Graham, went to Heaven. All of us children and our families miss her greatly. Her body is buried at the Billy Graham Library beside my father Billy Graham; but we know they aren’t there, they are in the presence of their Lord and Savior. And one day, the Bible tells us that they will come out of those graves! “For the Lord Himself will descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of an archangel, and with the trumpet of God. And the dead in Christ will rise first” (1 Thessalonians 4:16).

"We can’t bring about a revival in our own strength. It is something the Holy Spirit initiates. But we can prepare the ground...for another Jesus Movement." Read more from Greg Laurie in this month's Decision Magazine: https://decisionmagazine.com/greg-laurie-would-god-send-another-great-awakening/

Happy 75th birthday to former President Donald J. Trump! What a milestone! May God bless you, use you, and draw you close to Him.

I continue to be grateful for the policies President Trump put into place during his four years that strengthened our nation, resulting in the lowest unemployment in more than 50 years and the best economy since WWII. I’m immensely grateful for the appointment of so many conservative federal judges and Supreme Court Justices. He was also the most pro-life president in the history of our nation. Thank you President Trump! Join me in wishing him a happy birthday in the comments below.
Today is #FlagDay. May we remember to thank God for His hand on this great nation through the years and ask for His continued mercy and help. #OneNationUnderGod

This September/October I’ll be going to 8 cities along #Route66 for the God Loves You Tour. If you’d like to be a part of getting the word out and reaching people with the Gospel of Jesus Christ, you can find out more here: http://GodLovesYouTour.com

3-year-old Deo is from Uganda and Samaritan's Purse brought him to Ohio for heart surgery through our #ChildrensHeartProject. Deo’s surgery is scheduled for tomorrow morning—would you remember him in your prayers?

Jesus said, “Why do you call me ‘Lord, Lord,’ and not do what I tell you? Everyone who comes to me and hears my words and does them, I will show you what he is like: he is like a man building a house, who dug deep and laid the foundation on the rock. And when a flood arose, the stream broke against that house and could not shake it, because it had been well built.  But the one who hears and does not do them is like a man who built a house on the ground without a foundation. When the stream broke against it, immediately it fell, and the ruin of that house was great.” (Luke 6:46-49)

Birthing people?? The Biden Administration wants to use this term to replace the word “mothers” in the 2022 budget proposal. I’m glad some in Washington are challenging this ridiculousness! Congressional Representative Jason Smith said, “Joe Biden and Washington Democrats are trying to turn America into crazy town. One of the proudest moments that any of us have is whenever we get the title of mom or dad … And the fact that you have the woke liberal left trying to take motherhood from moms by trying to redefine the word for birthing person or birthing people, it's absolutely absurd.” I can only imagine what my mother would have to say about this crazy proposal! Pray that God would help our leaders and have mercy on our nation.

https://www.foxnews.com/media/biden-budget-birthing-people-woman-jason-smith-hearing
"Be still before the Lord and wait patiently for Him..." (Psalm 37:7) #Alaska

For a limited time this summer, the Billy Graham Evangelistic Association is premiering free movies on our YouTube Page that the whole family can enjoy together. https://billygraham.org/story/limited-time-free-movies-for-the-whole-family/

Former President George H.W. Bush would have turned 97 today! He was a good friend of my father Billy Graham for many years. Here’s a picture of them fishing off the coast of Maine back in 1989 and a picture of us at a Crusade in 2002. #Throwback

In a one-minute speech, this mother grabbed the attention of America—and I’m thankful for her courage! Being from China, Xi Van Fleet knows and has seen firsthand the dangers of Critical Race Theory that is being pushed in our schools and society. She told the school board—and now the world through national news—that Critical Race Theory has its roots in cultural Marxism and it teaches children to loathe their country, actually fueling racism. It leads people to judge based on skin color. She warned that China used the same kind of critical theory to divide people during their “Cultural Revolution.” She is exactly right—“Freedom is fragile, and we can lose it at any time if we don’t defend it."
Critical Race Theory is a very dangerous socialist, communist idea that has now made it mainstream in our schools by school boards who are supporting this leftist socialist ideology. Parents must rise up against the school boards and let their voices be heard. I would encourage Christians in these communities to be involved and run for school boards. How important it is for Christian men and women to take over the school boards so they can influence for the good. Join me in thanking and encouraging Xi Van Fleet in the comments below.
https://www.foxnews.com/us/virginia-xi-van-fleet-critical-race-theory-china-cultural-revolution-loudoun?fbclid=IwAR3ChlkRHbGByqPK5rBRkzOC8eqqEXveaPUuik5YJU8LdpqtIEr1ynYOsBk

Today we are celebrating what would have been my mother, Ruth Bell Graham’s, 101st birthday! Patricia Cornwell was her neighbor, dear friend, and fellow adventurer. If you would like to know more about my mother and her life, you might want to get a copy of the book “Ruth, a Portrait,” which Patricia wrote: https://www.billygrahambookstore.org/ruth-a-portrait

It is absolutely frightening that ONE PERSON could change a setting on their computer and it could take down the internet! With the whole world depending on the internet, there shouldn’t be just a handful of companies with the responsibility of managing it. I hope that President Biden will look into this and see the precarious position this puts us in—not only Americans, but people all around the world. This incident should be a wake-up call.

Years ago, when we first became able to send and receive email on our phones, I was at my father Billy Graham’s home and showed him how quickly I could get a question answered from one of our team members in another part of the world. I emailed the individual, and within a few short minutes the reply arrived with a notification ding. My father was impressed, but he asked me how it worked. I told him I didn’t know. He asked me who owned it. I told him I didn’t know that either! I think my father was on to something here. More and more, I think that’s a great question for today, because whoever “owns” the internet could control the world.

https://www.bbc.com/news/technology-57413224
Today would have been my mother Ruth Bell Graham’s 101st birthday! We will always miss her, but we know where she is!
"Your soul...can only be made alive by the Holy Spirit when you come and repent of your sins and receive Christ as your Lord and Savior." -Billy Graham #WednesdayWisdom

Promise Keepers has been ministering biblical truth to men for some 31 years, and has had a tremendous impact on so many lives. Get a group from your church or plan to go alone, but make plans to be at the July 16-17 conference at AT&T Stadium in Arlington, TX. You won’t regret this investment in your spiritual growth. http://PromiseKeepersEvent.com

This is great news! A victory for free speech and for all of us! After Loudoun County, Virginia, teacher Tanner Cross stood before his local school board and refused to affirm transgenderism because of his Christian faith, he was placed on leave. We thank God that today a judge ordered he be reinstated! Tanner had shared at the meeting, “I love all of my students but I will never lie to them regardless of the consequences. I’m a teacher but I serve God first and I will not affirm that a biological boy can be a girl and vice versa because it’s against my religion, it’s lying to a child, it’s abuse to a child, and it’s sinning against our God…”

Tanner’s Alliance Defending Freedom attorney is exactly right— “Public schools have no business compelling teachers to express ideological beliefs that they don’t hold, nor do they have the right to suspend someone simply for respectfully providing their opinion at a public meeting.” Continue to pray for Tanner and other teachers as an anti-biblical agenda tries to push them to go against their faith and convictions. Praise God for Christian teachers!

This police officer is a hero! When a three-week-old baby in Arkansas began choking, his parents Joe and Katelin called 911 for help. Rookie officer Cody Hubbard answered the call and told the media he was praying the whole way. He was able to quickly get the baby’s breathing back to normal. Praise God that baby Grady is now doing fine! Afterward, Officer Hubbard said, “I had the Lord with me on that call!” Our police and law enforcement respond to calls day in and day out where lives are on the line—including their own sometimes. This story is a reminder to be thankful for their dedication and courage as they serve in our communities. They need our prayers and our encouragement. Let Officer Hubbard and other officers reading this know that you appreciate them in the comments below.
